name: Monsters of the Deep
overview: A snake-style action game. Players guide a snake around a field with varying obstacles; the goal is to eat all of the mushrooms to proceed to the next level. Each time the snake eats a mushroom, it gets longer; a life is lost if the snake crashes into walls or itself. Published in Keypunch software's Adventure Quest IV game collection, as a game of "The Big 100" collection / a.k.a. "Worms" and in Your Computer magazine 1984/07.
